participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Emily is a natural leader who enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: i make straight as in school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school. i won homecoming queen this year.

participant_2.name: Robert Miller
participant_2.personality: Reflective and resilient, Robert has a strong will to overcome challenges and seeks to inspire others.
participant_2.background: i am a 45 year old male. i am a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i now live in the city.
